meanings.meaning: detach a ship from a fleet
consigned in one bottom(=a single ship)

vlive.korean: 내가 안 한척 해야 하는데 손을... I was supposed to pretend it wasn't me, but my hand... 듣기 View video B1A4 : B1A4 여름 연캉스
vlive.english: I was supposed to pretend it wasn't me, but my hand...

vlive.korean: '어제 노멀한 척 잘한다는 게 이런 건가요?' "Is this what you meant yesterday by being good at pretending to be normal?" 듣기 View video ONE : ❄️
vlive.english: "Is this what you meant yesterday by being good at pretending to be normal?"

vlive.korean: 다 한 척. I'm acting like I'm done. 듣기 View video SONAMOO : 꽃보다소나무(디애나랑2)
1위 한 척? Pretend that I'm ranked #1? 듣기 View video Suzy : [오프 더 레코드, 수지] EP 02
하루에 배가 한 척밖에 안 다녀요. Only one boat departs per day. 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [루다] HAPPY LUDA DAY 🎂
vlive.english: Only one boat departs per day.

examples.korean: He had a new car and a boat. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 새 승용차에 보트를 한 척 가지고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: He put all his savings into buying a boat. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 보트를 한 척 사는 데 저축한 돈을 모두 들였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
